subject: Countrywide Could Help Consolidate Your Debt w/ the Combo Loan
body:
&deployid


Countrywide Home Loans: Cash for any need! You could get up to a $1 million home equity line.1















Call us Toll-Free
1-800-000-0000























Enjoy lower rates and more benefits by using your home equity. It’s a smart way to pay.
From home improvements to weddings, college education to health care and more, you have a financially savvy way to pay, right under your roof. A home equity line of credit offers a competitive low rate and tax advantages (consult your tax adviser). Use it for anything you want — it’s as easy as writing a check! Call a Countrywide Personal Loan Consultant to find out how much equity you have and get started today!





















FREE Home Loan Consultation!  Call Countrywide at 1-800-000-0000
As America’s #1 Home Loan Lender,2 Countrywide has streamlined the approval process, so borrowers receive cash from their home’s equity even faster — often by the same time next month. Work with Countrywide and enjoy:

Personalized home financing solutions
A wide range of home loan options
Great rates
Affordable payments

Call today for your FREE loan consultation: 1-800-000-0000

















We are pleased to present you with this advertisement. If you would like to unsubscribe from future emails from Countrywide, if you no longer wish to receive email offers from Countrywide, click here to be removed.
